text: Megan Anderson (born 11 February 1990) is an Australian mixed martial artist. She fought in the Ultimate Fighting Championship and is the former Invicta FC featherweight champion. Of her 16 MMA fights, she was won 11 bouts and lost five. Anderson was born on the Gold Coast, Queensland. She lives in the US state of Missouri. ==References== ==Other websites== *UFC profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Queensland Category:People from Gold Coast, Queensland Category:Australian martial artists
title: Megan Anderson (fighter)
